statements: DELETE FROM distributions WHERE location = 'City Center';
DELETE FROM distributions WHERE distribution_id = 1 AND beneficiary_id = 101
DELETE FROM distributions WHERE distribution_date < '2022-01-01' AND (food_supply = 'Fruits' OR location = 'Hospital')
DELETE FROM distributions WHERE beneficiary_id IN (SELECT beneficiary_id FROM beneficiaries WHERE medical_condition = 'Critical')
DELETE FROM food_distribution WHERE quantity < 10 AND distribution_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM food_distribution WHERE item_name = 'Milk' AND distribution_date > '2022-03-01';
DELETE FROM medical_distribution WHERE item_name = 'Bandages' AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM food_distribution WHERE quantity < 10 OR distribution_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM medical_supply_distribution WHERE item_name = 'Bandages' AND quantity > 20;
DELETE FROM refugee_tracking WHERE age > 60 AND nationality = 'Syrian';
DELETE FROM supplies WHERE center_id = 2 AND quantity < 100;
DELETE FROM refugees WHERE location = 'Camp A' AND age > 50;
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Supplier'
